sentences.en: All organisms have nucleic acids present in their cells.
sentences.cn: 所有生物的细胞中都有核酸.

sentences.en: At warmer temperatures, nucleic acids unravel and cell membranes quickly dissolve.
sentences.cn: 在更高温度下, 核酸会散开,细胞膜也会迅速溶解.

sentences.en: But how could nucleic acids originate without proteins, and vice versa?
sentences.cn: 但是离开proteins,nucleicacids如何合成, 反之亦然?

sentences.en: DNA and RNA are both types of nucleic acid.
sentences.cn: 脱氧核糖核酸和核糖核酸是两种类型的核酸.

sentences.en: He recruited another nucleic acid chemist, a young Pakistani, Dr. Rao Sastri.
sentences.cn: 他又找来一名核酸化学家, 叫作拉奥·萨斯特利的年轻的巴基斯坦人.

sentences.en: Hepatitis B virus nucleic acid testing may eventually be introduced.
sentences.cn: 乙肝病毒的核酸检测方法最终也会被引入.

sentences.en: Interspecific hybridization of nucleic acids is a method of this type currently being developed.
sentences.cn: 核酸的种间杂交便是当前正在发展的这样一种方法.

sentences.en: It is chemically stable and basil - specific compared with nucleic acid.
sentences.cn: 与核酸分子相比,肽核酸有更高的稳定性、碱基特异性.

sentences.en: Natural big molecular substances mainly include protein, nucleic acid and sugars.
sentences.cn: 天然大分子物质主要包括蛋白 、 核酸和糖类.

sentences.en: Nucleic acid is extensively used in food industry, medical industry and agriculture.
sentences.cn: 核酸广泛应用于食品工业 、 医药工业和农业上.

sentences.en: Objective: observing effecting of BCG amylose nucleic acid to treat bronchial asthma.
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察卡介菌多糖核酸治疗支气管哮喘的效果.

sentences.en: Organisms rely on phosphorus to build nucleic acids and other molecules to grow and proliferate.
sentences.cn: 有机物依赖于磷来制造核酸和其他生长与繁殖所需的分子。

sentences.en: Ribose and deoxyribose are constituents of the nucleic acids RNA and DNA.
sentences.cn: 核糖与脱氧核糖分别是核糖核酸与脱氧核酸(DNA)的结构成分.

sentences.en: The capsid together with the enclosed nucleic acid is the nucleocapsid.
sentences.cn: 衣壳同包围它的核酸一起称为核衣壳.

sentences.en: They use X - ray diffraction to determine the structures of proteins and nucleic acids.
sentences.cn: 他们应用X - 射线衍射确定蛋白质和核酸的结构.

sentences.en: Thus, any random changes in the interior, fledgling ribozymes that could speed up nucleic acid replication rates will spread rapidly through an evolving population.
sentences.cn: 这样一来，细胞内部发生的使得核酶加速核酸复制速率的任何变化，都会在进化群体中快速扩散。

sentences.en: To study the gastrointestinal absorption of microzyme nucleic acid extracts in rats.
sentences.cn: 探讨大鼠对酵母菌核酸提取物的可吸收性.

sentences.en: Working with subsurface ice, brine or soil samples, SETG would attempt to isolate, amplify, detect and identify nucleic acids -- right there on Mars.
sentences.cn: SETG研究了地下冰、盐水或土壤样本，试图隔离、放大、监测和识别核酸，这种核算恰好就在火星上。
